review: I really like the Fire TV stick.My Amazon Prime movies & shows load up faster than the Amazon app I have on my smart tv.It's easy to navigate with the remote that comes with it.The only thing I don't like is the games apps.There isn't any great games to choose from.I have a few nice ones on my Kindle Fire but they were not compatible with the Fire Stick.
author: ~ Judi ~

review: Product is good. The only drawback is loose batteries​ inside.

review: For what it was designed to do, it works well, I bought it under the assumption that it worked like the Chromecast device, it doesn't, I thought I could pair it up with my Androide tablet and have it transmitted to the TV, Didn't work, but other then that it works mush like the roku device, I have that as well as the chromecast really didnt need the fire tv stick. would i have bought it if i new it didnt work, No, the Chromecast  is really what i wanted it to do.
